conversations.body_text: Hi Priit Saar,    We apologize for the delay. Due to stock shortages at our warehouse in Germany, we plan to wait until the new shipment arrives at the German warehouse around the 11th before shipping your order. This will help avoid customs duties. Since all previous shipments to Estonia have been sent via the German warehouse, we are unsure whether shipping directly from China would result in unexpectedly high taxes. If you require the items urgently, we can arrange for UPS to ship them to you. Please let us know your preference as soon as possible.

Dear SIMSONN,

Thank you for the update. I understand the situation with the stock
shortage and customs. I would prefer to wait for the order to be shipped
from the German warehouse to avoid potential customs duties. Please keep me
updated on the shipping status.

With kind regards,
Priit

Hi Priit Saar,    The latest inventory from our German warehouse has arrived, but the Plus X P2-H2 / Silver / Baseplate you purchased is still out of stock. Can we replace it with the Plus X P2-H2 / Black / Baseplate version for you?

Hello

Yes, please proceed with the order.

Priit
​  Okay, thank you for your confirmation. We have arranged for your shipment!

Dear SIMSONN,

I am writing to express my concern regarding the shipping method for my
recent order. Despite selecting and paying for express shipping, the pedals
were sent via regular mail (DHL Paket).

Could you please clarify why an express shipping option is available if all
shipments are handled in the same manner? I would appreciate it if we could
find a resolution to this matter.

Priit Saar

Dear SIMSONN,

Could you please investigate the current status of my recent order? I am
concerned as the package, for which I paid for express delivery, has not
yet arrived and its whereabouts are presently unknown.

I would appreciate it if you could provide a resolution to this matter.

Sincerely,
Priit Saar
